channel.title: Edit Sticky Notes on Quickly How Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Edit Sticky Notes on Quickly How Tutorials

item.title: How to Format Text in the Microsoft Sticky Notes App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Format Text: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Copy Text: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Cut Text: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Paste Text: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through these tutorial slides: Follow along with a tutorial video: How to Format Text With Click Method 1: First edit a sticky note and select any text.

item.title: How to Edit Sticky Notes in the Microsoft Sticky Notes App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Change the Color of a Sticky Note How to Edit Text in a Sticky Note How to Select Text in a Sticky Note: With Double Click With Mouse With Keyboard With Keyboard Shortcut How to Delete Text in a Sticky Note No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: See a tutorial video: How to Change the Color of a Sticky Note Step 1: First open a sticky note.

item.title: How to Create Sticky Notes in the Microsoft Sticky Notes App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Create a Sticky Note: With Click With Right Click With Search With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Watch a video tutorial: How to Create a Sticky Note With Click Method 1: First open the Notes List. Go to the upper left corner and click the “New note” or “+” button. A new sticky note appears. Method 2: Open a sticky note.
